Label: hasReplicateNumber
Description: The replicate index of the asset model or other output

Label: PreprocessedData
Description: Refers to the data ready to enter in the model evaluation

Label: NLPExperiment
Description: Defines the specific computational experiment related to NLP

Label: NLP annotation format
Description: Defines the specific format for NLP

Label: SummaryPrediction
Description: Defines a specific type of result

Label: Quality
Description: Refers to the parent class of the descriptive subclasses that characterizes dataset

Label: NEREvaluationMeasure
Description: Mode of evaluation specific for NER tasks

Label: ValidationSet
Description: Defines the third type of data split used during the training for the validation batch examples

Label: describedBy
Description: Classes may be described by an object of Quality class of its subclasses that specify characteristics

Label: TaggingFormat
Description: Defines the style of annotating the prefixes of the NER entties assigned to the tokens in the text
Parent class: edam.format_3862   # NLP annotation format class from edam format branch

Label: MLExperiment
Description: Defines the specification of computational experiment related to machine learning

Label: Operation
Description: Defines a procedure inserted as part of a pipeline
